name: Singularity (itch) (hacked.design)
description:
Singularity.

Entry to 1 button jam.

Ball drops, 1 button, 3 in a row = Win. Simple.

Any of the following buttons should work:

Left or Right Mouse Button, Enter, Ctrl, Alt or Touch

Credits

Sound & Arrow sprite from kenney.nl

Font https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Patrick+Hand
